Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO EDUCATION

Title: Relates to the establishment of a regional secondary school advisory council
Summary: Directs the commissioner of education to establish a regional secondary school advisory council and for such council to make recommendations regarding the establishment of regional high schools; provides for the repeal thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT to direct the commissioner of education to establish a regional secondary school advisory council to make recommendations on the establishment of regional secondary high schools; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
